== Accomplishments Suitability Charter ==

The Ubuntu Accomplishments system was developed in such a way that we focus on accomplishments that provide genuinely valuable experiences and that have a very low risk of being abused.

As such, we have developed a set of guidelines for new accomplishments. Please ensure your accomplishment ideas follow these guidelines:
